department: Department of Paintings, Sculpture & Decorative Arts
title: Rectangular locket
description: Japanese style, rectangular gold trim and loop in "bamboo," double sided and hinged, iron face with gold and silver applied detail decoration.  One side: basket of flowers; other side: two herons.  Interior is gold, with space for two pictures.  Related to 1895.632, 633, 634, 646?
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Fogg Museum, Bequest of Mrs. William Hayes Fogg
provenance: Mrs. William Hayes Fogg, New York NY, Bequest to Fogg Art Museum, 1895.

images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
